name: BTS Island: In the Seom
storyline:
Everyone arrives on an island for an unexpected vacation!

There was nothing on the island, but together, nothing is impossible!

Swim, fish, and set off fireworks!

Co-created by BTS from the very start. An island created for rest. See you in BTS Island: In the SEOM!
summary:
Come over and take a break for a while.

At an island due to an unexpected vacation. BTS Island is a soothing puzzle game where the BTS members make stories and decorate their island. From the BTS Island title logo, character designs, and even the OST! Come play BTS Island: In the SEOM, a game that BTS has been a part of the development process since the beginning.
